criteria.evaluation_guide: Look for JavaScript listed in skills section, project descriptions using JavaScript, or work experience involving JavaScript development. Should show strong/advanced level usage.
Check for TypeScript in skills or tech stack, projects built with TypeScript, or explicit mention in work experience. Look for evidence of type-safe development practices.

criteria.criterion: Modern web frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular)
criteria.evaluation_guide: Identify specific framework mentions (React, Vue, or Angular) in skills or project sections. Look for component-based development, state management, and framework-specific patterns in work descriptions.
Look for at least one of Node.js, Python, or Java in backend/server-side development context. Check for API development, server-side logic, or backend architecture experience.
Look for mentions of REST API design, development, or consumption. Check for terms like endpoint development, API integration, HTTP methods, or REST principles.
Search for microservices, distributed systems, or service-oriented architecture in experience. Look for descriptions of building or working with independent, loosely-coupled services.
Identify SQL database mentions like PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQL Server. Look for database design, query optimization, or relational database management in work history.
Check for NoSQL databases like MongoDB, Cassandra, DynamoDB, or Redis. Look for document stores, key-value databases, or non-relational data modeling experience.
Look for Git, GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket mentions. Check for branching strategies, pull requests, code collaboration, or version control workflows in experience.
Search for CI/CD, continuous integration, continuous deployment, or specific tools like Jenkins, GitHub Actions, CircleCI, Travis CI. Look for automated testing and deployment pipeline creation.

criteria.criterion: Cloud platform experience (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
criteria.evaluation_guide: Identify cloud platform mentions (AWS, Azure, GCP). Look for specific services used (EC2, S3, Lambda, Azure Functions, etc.) or cloud infrastructure management experience.
Look for Docker, Kubernetes, container orchestration, or containerization in skills or projects. Check for Dockerfile creation, K8s deployments, or container management experience.
Look for mentions of Agile, Scrum, sprint planning, stand-ups, retrospectives, or Scrum Master/Product Owner collaboration. Check for iterative development processes.
Search for DevOps, infrastructure as code, automation, monitoring, or related tools (Terraform, Ansible, Prometheus). Look for development and operations integration experience.
Check for GitHub profile links, mentions of open-source projects contributed to, pull requests to public repositories, or maintained OSS projects. Look for community involvement.

criteria.criterion: 5+ years of professional software development experience
criteria.evaluation_guide: Calculate total years of professional software development experience from work history. Ensure at least 5 years in software engineering roles, excluding internships unless specified otherwise.
Look for explicit mentions of mentoring, coaching, training junior developers, or leading team members. Check for descriptions of code review leadership or knowledge sharing activities.

criteria.criterion: Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions
criteria.evaluation_guide: Assess through project outcomes, successful product launches, scalability achievements, or measurable impact. Look for quality indicators like testing practices, code standards, or production stability mentions.

criteria.criterion: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
criteria.evaluation_guide: Check education section for Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology, or related technical fields. Note: Listed as preferred, so equivalent experience may substitute.

Look for descriptions of complex technical challenges solved, troubleshooting experience, or optimization achievements. Check for analytical thinking, debugging expertise, or innovative solutions in work history.

Assess through mentions of code quality, testing rigor, bug prevention, code review thoroughness, or precision in technical work. Look for quality assurance involvement or error reduction achievements.

Look for collaboration with cross-functional teams, technical documentation, presenting to stakeholders, or explaining technical concepts. Check for client-facing roles or team coordination experience.

Identify collaborative project work, cross-functional team participation, pair programming, or team-based achievements. Look for phrases indicating working with designers, product managers, or other engineers.

Check for experience conducting code reviews, leading technical discussions, onboarding team members, or guiding architectural decisions. Look for leadership in technical direction without formal management role.
Look for experience building web applications, SaaS products, or web-based platforms. Check for full-stack development, responsive design, browser technologies, and web performance optimization.

Search for experience with high-traffic systems, performance optimization, load balancing, caching strategies, or architecture for growth. Look for mentions of handling increased user loads or scaling challenges.

criteria.criterion: Ability to write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
criteria.evaluation_guide: Look for mentions of code quality standards, unit testing, integration testing, TDD/BDD practices, code documentation, or adherence to design patterns and best practices.
Check for explicit mentions of conducting code reviews, peer review processes, providing technical feedback, or ensuring code quality standards across the team.

Look for involvement in system design, architecture planning, technology selection, or technical strategy. Check for descriptions of designing solutions, evaluating trade-offs, or influencing technical direction.

Search for on-call experience, production support, debugging live systems, incident response, or performance troubleshooting. Look for mentions of maintaining system reliability or resolving critical issues.
